name: Space Vacuum
description:
This is a game where you need to suck up aliens with a vacuum ray.

By: dragonier135
For: Vim jam
theme: there and back
limitation: collectables

Game Dev notes: The vacuum does NOT actually suck anything its like a real vacuum where you have to stab the aliens. Also there are marker dots on the aliens that mark them. these don't actually do anything there just there to make the aliens easy to see.
